attributes.action: Create a system of Firework Licences for the general public to purchase and use fireworks.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Every year people of all ages are injured by fireworks being misused either by mistake or on purpose. If people had to earn a licence (on the same basis as earning a driving licence) then the sale and use of these dangerous explosives could be controlled and the intrinsic knowledge that a course of education to earn the license would bring would be invaluable.
